description:
Now,boot a vm like this:

nova  boot --flavor 1 --nic net-id=xxx--block-device source=blank,dest=volume,bootindex=0 

without size in bdm.

the vm state will be error .And error information is :No valid host was found.

So,I think we can't boot a vm that there is no size in bdm when source=blank and dest=volume.

We should checkt it in api side. and return code 400.
title: Can't boot with bdm of which the source type is blank and destination is volume
